system.requirements:
Tier 2; Frenzy
Aptitudes; Strength, Defence, Khorne
system.effect: Character can Parry whilst Frenzied. They can also re-roll a failed test to snap out of Frenzy or resist entering Frenzy if they choose to.

description.value: Character can Parry whilst Frenzied. They can also re-roll a failed test to snap out of Frenzy or resist entering Frenzy if they choose to.
